attributes.action: Fund  and build a state of the art Hospital dedicated to all Armed forces Veterans
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: British soldiers and veterans have a right to be treated in a private facility dedicated to providing them with the very best of care this country can provide surrounded by fellow veterans who can understand their problems and aid their recovery.We have had many wars since WWII but we have only 1 ward in selly oak in birmingham to treat our entire armed forces past present and future,,,this is a disgrace
